description:
Offline Dictionaries

OSS-Dict is an offline dictionary reader. It is fork of Aard 2 with new Material design and updated features

Features

  • Lookup queries are punctuation, diacritics and case insensitive.
  • Bookmarks and History
  • Dictionary Management
  • Article Appearance: add your custom style sheets
  • Math: Mathematical formuals are scalable, styleable, beautiful on any screen
  • Random Article
  • Volume Buttons Navigation
  • Fullscreen Mode
  • Clipboard Auto-Paste
  • External Link Sharing
